title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 17.6 - Other orders of transfer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 17.6 - Other orders of transfer

State Regulations
(a) The
commissioner may order the transfer of any patient or group of patients on his
own motion when warranted by the condition of the patient or the ability of the
facility to provide adequate care and treatment for such patient or
patients. (b) The receiving
facility shall take all necessary actions to regularize the legal status of any
such patients retained by it. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
17.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
